api.base_url: ManaPool API base URL. Usually doesn't need to be changed.

pricing.dry_run: When true, shows what changes would be made without actually updating prices. Keep as true for testing
pricing.strategy: Pricing strategy: 'lp_plus' (conservative, recommended), 'nm_with_floor' (safest - uses NM but won't go below LP+), 'average' (balanced - average of NM and LP+), 'nm_only' (aggressive - uses only NM price), 'general_low' (most competitive - uses general market price)
pricing.lp_floor_percent: LP+ floor percentage. 100.0 = strict floor (never go below LP+ price). Lower values allow prices below LP+.
pricing.min_price: Minimum price in dollars. Prices will never be set below this value.
pricing.max_reduction_percent: Maximum price drop per run (%). Prevents large price drops in a single update. Example: 5.0 means prices can drop at most 5% per run.
pricing.price_adjustment_factor: API prices are divided by this factor to get the true price. Default 1.042 accounts for API markup applied by ManaPool for singles fees.
